reviewtext: I gave this item 3 stars because it does what its supposed to do but NOT what I and most likely you want it to. You cannot connect two computers, at the same time, to the internet with this device. You need a router. Printer sharing and file sharing didnt work either. Two calls to Linksys tech support and my own personal attempt to make it work add up to strike three.. Unless you have a complicated set up, it basically does nothing.Forget this thing and suck it up and get a router, sure routers are a painbut they do what you want. This doesnt. A friend of mine wants it so he's getting a very early xmas present this year.
